void uvm_ml::uvm_ml_config_handler::config_callback ( std::string  cntxt,
std::string  inst_name,
std::string  field_name,
uvm_resource_base *  rsrc 
)

Configuration handler Callback.

Called when a config_db.set() is executed

Parameters:
cntxt - configuration context (hierarchy of component setting the rsrc)
inst_name - instance name the config applies to
field_name - name of the resource
rsrc - base pointer to the resource

Configuration handler Callback.

Called when a resource_db does any set action

Parameters:
action - resource action (eg. set, set_default ...)
scope - resource scope
name - name of the resource
rsrc - base pointer to the resource
